column4: anyone else want to take a stab at my flash issue? I have the flash plugin installed, chromium and firefox see it, but flash does not work in either browser. I've been working on this for 2 days now.
you name it, I'll install it.
does not show up in synapic
echo "deb http://deb.opera.com/opera/ stable non-free" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/opera.list; wget -O . http://deb.opera.com/archive.key | sudo apt-key add -
sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install debian-archive-keyring opera
could try linking the .so to ~/.opera/plugins folder
I did a ln -s for firefox, mozilla, and chromium, didn't work. Want me to try for opera while I'm at it?
i don't see the video crashing flash tbh. Have you tried Unity2D session?
I have tried ubuntu2d and also blackbox for the hell of it. No worky.
now what? flash does not work in Opera either.
not sure dude, its a weird one
